The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 03 April is 41,498 (4,803.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 29 March, there were 203 new confirmed cases (23.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 March, there were 262 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 23% (59 fewer cases).
